Reference

Capturing and testing

start_capturing() stop_capturing()

Capture and record database transactions and save them as mocks

with_mock_db()

Run the DBI queries inside against a mocked db

.mockPaths()

Set an alternate directory for mock API fixtures

Mock DB methods

dbDisconnect(<DBIMockConnection>) dbListTables(<DBIMockConnection>) dbListTables(<DBIMockConnection>) dbSendQuery(<DBIMockConnection>,<character>) dbFetch(<DBIMockResult>) fetch(<DBIMockResult>) dbClearResult(<DBIMockResult>) dbHasCompleted(<DBIMockResult>)

Methods for interacting with DB mocks instead of an actual database

Test DB creation

nycflights13_sql()

Create a standardised database for testing

nycflights13_sqlite()

Create an in-memory SQLite database for testing
